Description: An employee of the bank representing customers (Formerly Relationship Director)
A member of banking staff, eg RM Assistant or operational banking staff
A private customer
A corporate client - formerly known as Institution
A prospective private customer
A prospective corporate client
Address of customer, propect, or relationship manager (often a shared entitiy)
Phone number of customer, propect, or relationship manager
Email of customer, propect, or relationship manager
Social media handle of a customer, prospect, or relationship manager (eg LinkedIn, Facebook)
Contract or agreement between the bank and the customer
Contract Components - product types and links to Party Entities
Banking products available to customers
Banking products recommended to customers
Category indicating the relative value of the customer's net worth (eg Low, Med, High, Very High)
Interactions between customers and relationship managers
A fine grained customer service cost event in the context of specified dimension values
A customer alert to be actioned by the relationship manager (eg product opportunity)
A complaint made by the customer
A problem identified internally regarding customer or automated services
Segment of customer service
Process of customer service
Product of customer service
Non geographical breakdown of reporting country of customer service
Channel of customer service
Customer Application Component
Customer Journey
Questionnaire questions and answer sets
